snippet: The C.I.A.’s inspector general is investigating David H. Petraeus, who on Friday will follow Michael J. Morell, the agency’s acting director, in testimony to lawmakers on Libya.
abstract: Central Intelligence Agency's inspector general has begun investigation into general conduct of David H Petraeus, who resigned as CIA director after admitting to affair with his biographer Paula Broadwell; at same time, administration officials press ahead with inquiries into handling of September 11 attack that killed Ambassador J Christopher Stevens and three other Americans in Libya and prepare to hear Petraeus's testimony about attack.
lead_paragraph: The C.I.A.’s inspector general is investigating David H. Petraeus, who on Friday will follow Michael J. Morell, the agency’s acting director, in testimony to lawmakers on Libya.

headline.main: C.I.A. Investigates Petraeus Affair as Lawmakers Press Libya Attack Inquiry
headline.print_headline: C.I.A. Investigates Petraeus Affair as Lawmakers Press Libya Attack Inquiry

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
